title: Alouette, Canada's first satellite
creator_credit: C R Yool, Crawley Films and National Film Board of Canada
brief_description: Design, construction, function, and launching of Canada’s first earth satellite. On the other side of the ionosphere, Alouette tracks the solar disturbances that affect radio communication and transmits much useful information for research purposes. Uses animated diagrams.
creator_credit_for_label: C R Yool, Crawley Films and National Film Board of Canada
